### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
### Copper plate factory at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
### Boiler at position(x=18.5, y=10.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=18.5, y=10.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure there are no existing objects in the way before attempting to place an entity
- Make sure to remove any existing entities at the target position before continuing
### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are available before attempting to craft an item
- Ensure that the recipe for the required sub-ingredient exists, and that it is not a raw resource that must be gathered first
### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure that the agent is within reach of the resource to be harvested before attempting to harvest
- Ensure that there is something within reach to harvest before attempting to harvest
### Errors when using entities
- Ensure that the entity is connected to the required fluid or power systems before attempting to use it
- Ensure that the entity has the required fuel or input liquid before attempting to use it
